entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING ENDED, Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:58 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 5:58 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.0°C
Wind: W 35 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
